channel.title: Home on MadMeme
channel.description: Recent content in Home on MadMeme

item.title: Das Krokodil im Zoo
item.description: Introduction In the following a german text is presented. Click here! Click the element in order to interact with the text! Each italicword in the text can be clicked. Try it out now and click the words above. Several interactions are hidden. Have fun! :-)  Continue? However, the text contains riddles. Only if all riddles solved, the boringpreviousnextboringparagraph is shown.

item.title: ParaText Documentation
item.description: ParaText Documentation Paragraphs Paragraph Alignment Alignment can be done using one of the following codes at the beginning of a pragraph. <<: left-aligned >>: right-aligned <>: justified ><: centered  Continue? Text and Narrator Paragraphs Text Paragraphs can be defined using --- on a single line. Each element in one text paragragph has to be figured out in order for the next text paragraph to appear.

item.title: Separable Prefix Verbs
item.description: Separable Prefix Verbs German seems complex, but it’s actually really easy. Let’s start practising Separable prefix verbs (SPV). I’ll show you. You will get it really quick. Each italicword in the text can be clicked. Try it out now and click the words above.  Continue? SPV are simply verbs that can separate. They consist of: a prefixand a verbstem For example: einkaufen ankommen aufwachen Are you ready for your first task?
